data.message: Thank you Facebook. I mived to Florida 3 years ago and haven't been able to go home for visit. But, Facebook messenger has video calling. My niece called me when she was visiting my mom. I loved being able to see her as we talked. Hopefully I'll get to go home for the holidays. I love my mom. She's my best friend.

replies.message: What a touching story, Kathy. Thanks for sharing with us. -Abby
I have a go fund me page. I'm on disability. By the time I pays rent,μμ76666
Ooops. By the time I pay rent, electricity and my other bills, I have money for food abd that's about it. Hopefully I'll get some donations and I'll get to go home for a vusit
